messages.title: YES TO EUROPE, NO TO CLIMATE CHAOS
messages.content: "Birkenhead has a proud history. But, decades of neglect have let people down. We need fresh thinking, fresh ideas and fresh energy to help build a town we can all be proud of again." - Pat Cleary

leaflet.personalStatement: We need fresh thinking, fresh ideas and fresh energy to help build a town we can all be proud of again.

images.caption: Pat Cleary standing in front of a blurred background, looking at the camera, with text overlays VOTE PAT CLEARY and Green Party for the common good. YES TO EUROPE, NO TO CLIMATE CHAOS.
